title: Phantom

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Possess someone into someone else every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The possessed Is redirected and deals a Basic Attack to the other target.
-The night after you possess someone, they're dealt a Powerful Attack. You may still use your possession the same night.
-The first time you are attacked, immediately revive yourself at the end of the night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who may oppose you.

desc:

*Is it just me or...the light turned on on its own?*
